item.description:
"[Gotta:

;216890"]Where did this silly rumour come from? Half-Life 2: Episode 3, is the end of the current story arc, NOT the end of Gordon Freeman or his magical journeys through time and space. :freeman:

I seem to recall there was an interview with someone at Valve that stated that Ep3 would be the last HL game with Gordon as protagonist. I think If and When Half Life 3 comes out, Gordon will still be a key character, but he will be an NPC and another character will take the role as the hero. It could be Barney, or Shepard, or Chell, or someone completely new.

item.title: HL2:EP3 at E3 [Rumor]
item.dc:creator: _Gotta
item.description:
busterofwar:

Yes. If this is really the end of Gordon’s journey, I want him to go out with a bang! The stories of HL2 + EP1 and 2 are quite possibly the best in gaming and I would love if Episode 3 not only continued this but also beat it.
Valve has been leading to this game for a while. With so many unanswered questions it makes sense that they are taking a while to develop this. I do not care how long it takes. It will be worth the wait!

Where did this silly rumour come from? Half-Life 2: Episode 3, is the end of the current story arc, NOT the end of Gordon Freeman or his magical journeys through time and space. :freeman:
